Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIpackage

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ConnectionCreator  
    SceneObserver  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ConnectionScene
    Scene that asks for ip and port needed to connect to the server
    DiscardLeadersScene
    Scene that displays the distributed leader cards and asks for discard
    EndScene
    This scene is used after a closing server-side
    GUI
    GUI class
    InitialResourcesScene
    Scene that displays that you must choose many resources for start game
    NicknameScene
    Scene used to get user's nickname
    NumPlayersScene
    Scene used to get the number of players for the match
    PlayerBoardScene
    Main scene of the game, it implements all the actions which player can do
    SceneObservable  
    TransitionHandler  
    WaitingScene
    Scene used to wait for other players' choices
    WinnerScene
    Scene that print the winner player and credits
